headline: Should Verizon Partnership and Direct Satellite Connectivity Shift the Trajectory for AST SpaceMobile (ASTS) Investors?
summary: AST SpaceMobile announced a definitive commercial agreement with Verizon to provide direct-to-cellular satellite service for Verizon customers starting in 2026, leveraging their space-based broadband network to enhance U.S. connectivity. This collaboration enables standard smartphones to connect directly to satellites, targeting nationwide coverage and aiming to address remote area cellular dead zones without requiring specialized devices. We'll examine how the Verizon deal and its...
